page.title: 06SHIREBROOK COLLIERY cont'd
page.content: Q. Where does the coal go? A. To Power Stations except 3% which is concessionary. Q. How safe is the pit? A. Not as safe as it should be. Q. Have you ever found any interesting fossils? A. Only mussels and ferns. Soon Shirebrook will be working the same seam as Bolsover where the interesting fossils have been found. Q. What facilities do you provide for the comfort of the miners? A. First Aid, baths, showers, canteen, clothes and safety equipment? Q. When was the last time a woman worked at the pit? A. The last woman to work underground was in 1914 and on the surface in 1937.
